highlights.detail: Working on a recommendation engine that helps deliver meaningful context to our call center agents in real time
Further expanding and maintaining data pipelines from a variety of sources.
Developing internal python packages for logging, webex bot messaging, and a Cherwell API client.
I am part of technical discussions and planning sessions for our projects as a data science expert.
Further leadership responsibilities, from interviewing candidates to grow our team, to increased mentorship.

Project saving the company upwards of $40M per year. Reducing un-needed truck rolls by identifying customers no longer in need of maintenance. Used simulations and quantile regression to identify 'healthy' devices to assist in the cancellation logic while maintaining positive customer experience using R, Python, Gradient Boosting, and FastAPI.

Reporting system for extracting, aggregating, and visualizing internal application log data. Included ticketing system for applications in error rate breach and additional data collection forms. Resulted in better system visibility and understanding, and decreased resolution times. Using Python, FastAPI, Chart.js, Vue.js, Postgres, Splunk, Docker.
Develop suite of ETLs from a variety of sources from log aggregation tools and other databases.

Technical leader of a small team of developers and data scientists. I mentor team members through detailed code reviews, paired programming sessions, and periodic 1-on-1 meetings. I work with upper management to plan features and future direction, then delegate work to team members in weekly sprint planning sessions.

Selected as project winner for enterprise wide idea kick starter program. Developed a REST service to predict most profitable product to attempt an upsell using a cross of concepts from reinforcement learning and traditional multi-label classification. Using Python, Keras, FastAPI, Elasticsearch, and Docker
Developed analytic dashboard using the Shiny framework in R
Developed outlier detection process for quicker identification of system errors
Developed improved data pipelines for our Tableau server, reducing run time by around 75% and reducing the number of workflows drastically
Admin for our teams Tableau server, Alteryx server, and Bitbucket repositories
Instructed undergraduate level statistics computing labs and quantitative reasoning course. 76% of students reported that I was 'Extremely Helpful', an additional 15% reporting 'Very Helpful'
Instructed 6th through 12th grade math classes by creating engaging lesson plans.
